content:
EXISTING STRUCTURES
────────────────────────
### Resource Depot & Smelting Facility at base position (x=-4.5, y=18.5)
Consists of the following entities:
- Wooden Chest at position (x=-4.5, y=18.5), serving as the central storage depot.
- Stone Furnace at position (x=-3.0, y=19.0), used for smelting iron ore into iron plates. (Note: This furnace recently processed additional iron ore to extract new iron plates.)
- Stone Furnace at position (x=-4.0, y=21.0), used for processing copper ore into copper plates (status: NO_FUEL; warning: ["out of fuel"]).

### Automation Lab & Steam Power System (Integrated System)
Consists of the following entities:
- Lab at position (x=-7.5, y=18.5), used for automation research.
- Boiler at position (x=-5.5, y=24.0), used for generating steam (status: NO_FUEL; warning: ["out of fuel"]).
- Generator (Steam Engine) at position (x=-0.5, y=24.5), converting steam into electrical power (status: NOT_CONNECTED; warnings: ["no input liquid", "no fluid present in connections"]).
- Offshore Pump at position (x=-7.5, y=25.5), supplying water to the system.
- Electricity Group (id=928) supporting power distribution with small electric poles at positions (x=-0.5, y=11.5), (x=-4.5, y=15.5), (x=0.5, y=14.5), (x=-5.5, y=18.5), (x=-8.5, y=21.5) and (x=-2.5, y=24.5) (voltage: 33).
- Pipe Groups forming the fluid network:
   • PipeGroup (fluid_system=1584) at position (x=-10.5, y=16.5) with pipes at positions (x=-10.5, y=16.5), (x=-9.5, y=17.5), (x=-9.5, y=16.5), (x=-9.5, y=19.5) and (x=-9.5, y=18.5) (status: EMPTY).
   • PipeGroup (fluid_system=1585) at position (x=-12.5, y=18.5) (status: EMPTY).
   • PipeGroup (fluid_system=1587) at position (x=-8.5, y=20.5) carrying water with pipes at positions (x=-8.5, y=20.5), (x=-7.5, y=21.5), (x=-7.5, y=20.5), (x=-7.5, y=23.5), (x=-7.5, y=22.5) and (x=-7.5, y=24.5) (status: FULL_OUTPUT).
   • PipeGroup (fluid_system=1589) at position (x=-2.5, y=21.5) with pipes at positions (x=-2.5, y=21.5), (x=-1.5, y=21.5), (x=-0.5, y=21.5) (status: EMPTY).

No new structures have been successfully built in recent steps.

ERROR TIPS
────────────────────────
- AssemblingMachine1 Placement Failures:
  • Multiple placement attempts for the AssemblingMachine1 (using various directions and spacings) failed due to collisions with existing entities (such as the wooden chest, furnace, electric pole, and lab) or unsuitable terrain (water). To mitigate this, verify the target build location is completely free, consider increasing spacing, adjusting the placement direction, or selecting an alternative reference position.
  
- Recipe Setting Errors:
  • The error “name 'placed_assembler' is not defined” indicates that a variable expected to reference the deployed AssemblingMachine1 was never correctly assigned. Ensure that the entity placement returns a valid reference before attempting to set recipes.
  
- Nearest Buildable Area Search Issues:
  • Errors such as “TypeError: 'Position' object is not callable” and “name 'center_pos' is not defined” occurred during attempts to use the nearest buildable area. Check that position objects are treated as data (not called as functions) and that any computed center position variable is properly defined and accessible before use.
